name: Building hospital tents
description: The medical team needs a facility to treat the wounded. Needs to be done within 2 days.

name: Bring food supply from SupplyTeam-Bravo
description: SupplyTeam-Bravo has arrived. Needs to be distributed to the sites.

name: Dispatch searchers (air)
description: Dispatch the helicopters. Need to get wide coverage.

name: Dispatch searchers (ground)
description: Search for anyone who is injured, lost, bring them to the safe zone.
